name: Skipper (itch)
description:
“... certainly a game that begs for one more minute, and I found myself going back often, especially as friends got involved over my shoulder.”
GameCritics

“Skipper is simple, elegant, challenging, and fun. If you’re looking for a title to test your skills in a mental way, then you should definitely check this out.”
PopGeeks

“Skipper is a simple, pleasant puzzle game that’s bold enough to let you get stuck.”
The Fountain

Skipper is a fun, challenging, relaxing lowpoly puzzle game with over 30 levels to bend your mind and challenge your problem solving ability.

Skipper's controls are simple and the game's difficulty has an approachable learning curve making puzzlers of all abilities able to easily dive into the game.

Regular (free!) puzzle packs will drop for the game, with packs already scheduled for November 6th, December 12th, and January 9th.

Skipper brings you

  • Over 30 unique and challenging puzzles
  • Most puzzles can be solved in more than one way
  • Regular drops of new puzzles for free
  • Keyboard and Gamepad controls
  • An attractive lowpoly environment
  • A soothing sound track and effects
  • DRM and shenanigan free
